Name: Escape from the hospital
About the game: Escape from the hospital is a small quest puzzle. You find yourself in an abandoned hospital for unknown reasons and you have no choice but to start looking for a way out. On your way you will meet various monsters and not difficult puzzles. The playing time is about 30-40 minutes.
